statements: UPDATE CampaignData SET total_spend = 5000.50, total_clicks = 1000 WHERE campaign_id = 1234;
UPDATE CampaignData SET start_date = '2022-06-01', end_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Campaign';
UPDATE CampaignData SET total_spend = 5000.75, total_clicks = 100 WHERE campaign_id = 101
UPDATE CampaignData SET total_impressions = 50000, total_spend = total_spend + 2500.25 WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale'
UPDATE past_promotional_campaign SET impact_on_demand = 1500.50 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE future_demand_prediction SET predicted_demand = 2000.00 WHERE prediction_id = 5;
UPDATE past_promotional_campaign SET impact_on_demand = 1500.75, promotion_start_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE campaign_id = 10;
UPDATE future_demand_prediction SET predicted_demand = 5000.50, prediction_date = '2022-12-01' WHERE campaign_id = 15;
UPDATE promotional_campaign_data SET budget = 15000.00 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE demand_analysis SET demand_actual = 750, demand_discrepancy = 50 WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE promotional_campaign_data SET budget = 15000.50, target_audience = 'Young Adults' WHERE campaign_id = 101
UPDATE future_demand_prediction SET demand_prediction = 2500, prediction_date = '2023-09-15' WHERE analysis_id = 201
UPDATE promotional_campaign_data SET budget = 5000.50 WHERE campaign_id = 1
UPDATE promotional_campaign_data SET target_audience = 'California' WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale'
UPDATE promotional_campaign_data SET budget = 15000.00, start_date = '2022-05-01' WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE promotional_campaign_data SET target_audience = 'Young Adults', end_date = '2022-08-31' WHERE campaign_id = 102;
UPDATE past_campaigns SET total_spent = 5000.00, total_sales = 10000.00 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', birth_date = '1990-08-20' WHERE customer_id = 5;
UPDATE past_campaigns SET total_sales = total_sales + 500.00, total_spent = total_spent - 200.50 WHERE campaign_id = 10;
UPDATE customers SET birth_date = '1990-05-15', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 25;
